title: Took me out of my promos for no reason
body: I was only one game into my promos and then it just took me out. I played one game and then i went to go look at my profile and it said i have only 85 LP. I dont know what happened but i would really like it fixed because i just played another ranked game and it was a loss and it dropped even more LP. I thought maybe if i played another it would of just said 2 loss's in promos. Please help

replies.body:
Even when you're in a promo series, you'll gain and lose LP for matches. This makes if fair in the event that you were close to winning but lost by one match, you won't have to fight your way from 0 LP again. Our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) goes over the complete details of this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
